Parameters: byte: The MAC address of the Aware discovery interface. The application must have the @B_android#Manifest#permission#ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION_E@ to get the actual MAC address, otherwise all 0's will be provided.

ClassDesc: Base class for a listener which is called with the MAC address of the Aware interface whenever it is changed. Change may be due to device joining a cluster, starting a cluster, or discovery interface change (addresses are randomized at regular intervals). The implication is that peers you've been communicating with may no longer recognize you and you need to re-establish your identity - e.g. by starting a discovery session. This actual MAC address of the interface may also be useful if the application uses alternative (non-Aware) discovery but needs to set up a Aware connection. The provided Aware discovery interface MAC address can then be used in @B_android#net#wifi#aware#WifiAwareSession#createNetworkSpecifierOpen_E@ or @B_android#net#wifi#aware#WifiAwareSession#createNetworkSpecifierPassphrase_E@.
